db:abstract.db:para: The QPlaceRatings class holds rating information about a place.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Rating information is used to describe how good a place is conceived to be. Typically this information is visualized as a number of stars. The average() function returns an aggregated ratings value out of a possible maximum as given by the maximum() function.
db:section.db:programlisting: qDebug() << QString("This place rated ") + place.ratings().average() + "out of " + place.ratings().maximum() + "stars";

db:section.db:title: qreal QPlaceRatings::average() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the average value of individual ratings.

db:section.db:title: int QPlaceRatings::count() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of individual ratings.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceRatings::isEmpty() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if all fields of the place ratings are 0; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: qreal QPlaceRatings::maximum() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum possible rating value.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceRatings::setAverage(qreal average)
db:section.db:para: Sets the average value of the ratings.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceRatings::setCount(int count)
db:section.db:para: Sets the total number of individual ratings to count.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceRatings::setMaximum(qreal max)
db:section.db:para: Sets the maximum possible rating value to max.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceRatings::operator!=(const QPlaceRatings &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if other is not equal to this ratings object, otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceRatings &QPlaceRatings::operator=(const QPlaceRatings &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this ratings object and returns a reference to this ratings object.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceRatings::operator==(const QPlaceRatings &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if other is equal to this ratings object, otherwise returns false.
